item.title: [Resolved] Degraded service
item.description: Resolved - We believe all users experiencing issues have been able to connect at this time. (23:27 UTC — Feb 1) Monitoring - We believe the connectivity issues are being caused by an isolated ISP issue. We’ve had reports that swapping to Google DNS servers (see here; https://developers.google.com/speed/public-dns/docs/using) resolves the problem for users. (14:00 UTC — Jan 31) Investigating We’re aware of reports that users are experiencing some random problems. We’re currently investigating these issues, and apologize for any inconvenience it may be causing you.
item.content:
Resolved - We believe all users experiencing issues have been able to connect at this time. (23:27 UTC — Feb 1)

Monitoring - We believe the connectivity issues are being caused by an isolated ISP issue. We’ve had reports that swapping to Google DNS servers (see here; https://developers.google.com/speed/public-dns/docs/using) resolves the problem for users. (14:00 UTC — Jan 31)

Investigating

  • We’re aware of reports that users are experiencing some random problems. We’re currently investigating these issues, and apologize for any inconvenience it may be causing you. (17:12 UTC — Jan 30)
